According to history there has always been a good grade of oil in that area. When a tribe wanted the best oil they would generally travel to the territory of Asher to get it. 
 
 But, it was olive oil...
 
 And despite Brown's interpretation, most of the time oil symbolizes the Spirit of God - anointed with oil (Holy Spirit); the parable of the 10 virgins, etc.
 
 I would think that anyone who declares to be born again and using the Bible would see that.
